title: Fix LilyCard hover inset background regression and round right sidebar hover highlights

requirements.text: Fix the LilyCard hover inset background so it reliably becomes visible on hover (not hidden by stacking context/background painting) across the app feed, including in both light and dark themes.

quotes: its still not working. fix it.

acceptanceCriteria: When hovering any LilyCard, an inset background highlight is clearly visible behind the card content.
The hover highlight works in both light and dark mode (no near-invisible contrast).
The hover highlight remains inset (does not bleed outside the card) and respects rounded corners.

requirements.text: Ensure the LilyCard hover inset background layer never blocks or breaks interactions (links, like button, share button, bookmark button) while the hover effect is active.

quotes: its still not working. fix it.

acceptanceCriteria: All clickable elements in LilyCard remain clickable on hover, with normal cursor/hover behavior.
No element becomes unclickable due to the hover background layer overlaying it.

requirements.text: Update the right column (RightSidebar and TagHubRightSidebar) list items so the hover background highlight has visible border radius (rounded corners) consistent with the item shape.

quotes: also can you make the onhover background for the items in the right column have border radius too.

acceptanceCriteria: In RightSidebar sections (Trending Ponds, Popular Tags, Hot This Week), hovered items show a rounded hover background (no square corners).
In TagHubRightSidebar tag items, hovered items show a rounded hover background (no square corners).
The rounded hover highlight remains visually correct even with the current negative horizontal margins (-mx-2) and the sidebar containerâ€™s overflow clipping.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI primitives).
Do not modify immutable hook/bootstrap files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: No redesign of sidebar content, ordering, or data fetching logic beyond hover/visual behavior fixes.
